titleStmt.title: Catalogue du Salon de Photographie du Photo-Club de Paris, 5ème année

bibl.title: Catalogue du Salon de Photographie du Photo-Club de Paris, 5ème année
bibl.author: Photo-Club de Paris
bibl.extent: 102 pages, [12] leaves of plates : illustrations ; 17 cm

surrogates.name: Metropolitan Museum of Art (New York, N.Y.)

event.head: Salon de Photographie du Photo-Club de Paris, 5ème année
Photo-Club de Paris

samplingDecl.p: This electronic version of the catalog only reproduces the entries that correspond to exhibited works. All text preceding or succeeding the list of documents is not reproduced below.
